title: Bold reforms for affordable housing!
excerpt: Property investors and their lobbyists want to keep prices sky high, but we won't let them. Housing is a human right - will you add your name to this petition and show Labor that the nation is ready for ambitious housing reform?
description: Property investors and their lobbyists want to keep prices sky high, but we won't let them. Housing is a human right - will you add your name to this petition and show Labor that the nation is ready for ambitious housing reform?
